gloss: The part of the leg of a human being below the ankle, on which the feet rest.
A unit of linear measure equal to 12 inches or 30.48 cm, used in measuring lengths and heights.
The act of establishing one's foothold or position.
The bottom of something, as of a hill or mountain ; a footing.
The base or bottom of something.
To put into operation or existence.
